description.full: R.B.I. Baseball is bringing retro arcade action to your fingertips in its revival of one of the most popular baseball video game franchises of all time! R.B.I. Baseball utilizes real MLB teams and players, including all 30 teams and 750 REAL Major League players.  With updated graphics, achievements, leaderboards, and the ability to play against your friends on Xbox LIVE - this game is a home run!
